amendment.description: Amendment to require all funds authorized under the Act to be expended in a manner consistent with the manual on Standards of Ethical Conduct for Employees of the Executive Branch.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-537 to require all funds authorized under the Act to be expended in a manner consistent with the manual on Standards of Ethical Conduct for Employees of the Executive Branch.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (NY) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 421 - 0 (Roll no. 445).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Murphy (NY).
